FAQ.QUESTION: How do I create an account?
How do I add a Node?
FAQ.ANSWER: On the mapping page, choose a node and there is a link on the top right side of screen

FAQ.QUESTION: How do I edit a Node?
FAQ.ANSWER: On the mapping page, choose a node and there is a link on the top right of the screen

FAQ.QUESTION: How do I change my password?
FAQ.ANSWER: Logging in with you username, then go to account settings and change your password
